name: Oakay Acorn
description:
Oakay Acorn

Evil forest creatures are trying to destroy the precious Acorn before it can take root in the ground! Use your powers as a mighty oak to block  their attacks.

Controls:

Press and drag while holding left click to create leaf Barriers

Tap tree branches tree times to destroy them!

Press R if you want to force restart the game.

You can reflect Stingers to kill the wasps.

Programming and Sound by Good Bird

Art By Mia De La Fuente

Artist Instagram: @mia.not.maria

Made for GMTK 2020 "Out of Control" Jam

Made using Unity, Garage band, Photoshop, and Pixel Studio

Game Jam Logo Provided by Mark Brown of GMTK

(the name is because it is an oak tree)
